trans-unit.source: Rules that you can share with your colleagues

seg-source.mrk: Rules that you can share with your colleagues

trans-unit.source: You can share useful reprocessing rules with your colleagues so that they can work with the rules, too.

seg-source.mrk: You can share useful reprocessing rules with your colleagues so that they can work with the rules, too.

target.mrk: 동료들도 사용할 수 있도록 유용한 재처리 규칙을 공유할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: You can find all shared rules on the <uicontrol>Shared Rules</uicontrol> tab. You can share or unshare rules by selecting or deselecting<uicontrol>Share Rule</uicontrol> on the <uicontrol>Reprocessing Rule</uicontrol> tab on the detailed page of each reprocessing rule.

seg-source.mrk: You can find all shared rules on the <uicontrol>Shared Rules</uicontrol> tab.
You can share or unshare rules by selecting or deselecting<uicontrol>Share Rule</uicontrol> on the <uicontrol>Reprocessing Rule</uicontrol> tab on the detailed page of each reprocessing rule.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>공유 규칙</uicontrol> 탭에서 모든 공유 규칙을 찾을 수 있습니다.
재처리 규칙별로 세부 페이지의 <uicontrol>재처리 규칙</uicontrol> 탭에서 <uicontrol>규칙 공유</uicontrol>를 선택하거나 선택 해제하는 방식으로 규칙에 대한 공유 또는 공유 해제를 적용할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to use a shared reprocessing rule that had been created by another colleague, you need to mark the shared rule as a favorite. The rule will then be available in a popup when you select the <uicontrol>Apply Rule</uicontrol> button in the <uicontrol>Reprocess Bank Statement Items</uicontrol> app.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to use a shared reprocessing rule that had been created by another colleague, you need to mark the shared rule as a favorite.
The rule will then be available in a popup when you select the <uicontrol>Apply Rule</uicontrol> button in the <uicontrol>Reprocess Bank Statement Items</uicontrol> app.

target.mrk: 다른 동료에 의해 생성된, 공유된 재처리 규칙을 사용하려면 이 공유된 규칙을 즐겨찾기로 표시해야 합니다.
그러면 <uicontrol>은행 계정 명세서 항목 다시 처리</uicontrol> 앱에서 <uicontrol>규칙 적용</uicontrol> 버튼 선택 시, 팝업에서 이 규칙을 사용할 수 있게 됩니다.

trans-unit.source: If you have the scope item for <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/product/SAP_CASH_APPLICATION/LATEST/en-US" scope="external">SAP Cash Application</xref>, you can automate reprocessing rules. However, <emphasis>shared</emphasis> reprocessing rules cannot be automated. That means, a reprocessing rule can be either shared or automated.

seg-source.mrk: If you have the scope item for <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/product/SAP_CASH_APPLICATION/LATEST/en-US" scope="external">SAP Cash Application</xref>, you can automate reprocessing rules.
However, <emphasis>shared</emphasis> reprocessing rules cannot be automated.
That means, a reprocessing rule can be either shared or automated.

target.mrk: <xref format="html" href="https://help.sap.com/viewer/product/SAP_CASH_APPLICATION/LATEST/en-US" scope="external">SAP Cash Application</xref>에 적용되는 범위 항목이 있을 경우 재처리 규칙을 자동화할 수 있습니다.
단, <emphasis>공유</emphasis> 상태인 재처리 규칙은 자동화될 수 없습니다.
다시 말해, 재처리 규칙은 공유되든지 아니면 자동화될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If you want to automate one of your shared reprocessing rules, you must unshare the rule first. If you want to automate a shared reprocessing rule that had been created by colleague, you must copy the rule then automate it, but be aware that the new rule will not be a shared rule.

seg-source.mrk: If you want to automate one of your shared reprocessing rules, you must unshare the rule first.
If you want to automate a shared reprocessing rule that had been created by colleague, you must copy the rule then automate it, but be aware that the new rule will not be a shared rule.

target.mrk: 공유 상태인 재처리 규칙들 중 하나를 자동화하려면 먼저 이 규칙에 대한 공유를 해제해야 합니다.
동료에 의해 생성된, 공유된 재처리 규칙을 자동화하려면 이 규칙을 복사한 후 자동화해야 합니다. 이때 새로운 규칙은 공유 규칙이 될 수 없습니다.
